name: Cities
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare 39 Compo. A game where you try to guide people fleeing from dying cities.

Use arrows to switch between light sources. Use arrow up to activate a light post, arrow down to deactivate. Use A and D to rotate rotatable light posts.

Note:

Cities (updated).zip contains a small bug fix, fixing a level breaking bug where a group of citizens where unable to reach the goal of a level.

Cities.zip is the version originally submitted to Ludum Dare 39.
